backend/main.mo: Empty actor definition with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing three backgroundâ€‘music features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing short descriptions of all frontend pages and romance components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document loading the React root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all pages and wraps routing in MusicProvider.
frontend/src/components/romance/Countdow: Displays countdown or Proposal Day message using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/romance/EasterEg: Interactive heart that opens a full-screen modal revealing a secret message.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicPro: Context managing background music playback, autoplay retries, and user preference persistence.
frontend/src/components/romance/MusicTog: Button to toggle music state, switching icons based on playback.
frontend/src/components/romance/Overlays: Renders decorative rose-petal and glowing-heart background overlays.
frontend/src/components/romance/Romantic: Global layout with watermark, overlays, music toggle, countdown, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and refreshes a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: A React hook that calculates remaining time until a target date and updates every minute, returning days, hours, minutes, seconds, and expiration status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a romantic color palette, typography utilities, glow effects, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, wrapping the application with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/FeelMyLove.tsx: Interactive page with heart animations that reveals a romantic message and navigation after timed effects.
frontend/src/pages/Forever.tsx: A sentimental page with animations and text expressing long-term love and commitment.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with animated romantic visuals introducing the experience and linking to the love story.
frontend/src/pages/LoveLetter.tsx: Page displaying a styled heartfelt love letter with a textured background and romantic typography.
frontend/src/pages/OurStory.tsx: React page rendering a timeline-style love story with animated milestone cards that fade in on scroll. Includes emotional text sections and decorative UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/Proposal.tsx: Proposal page showing timed text sequence and two possible celebration screens with animations, confetti, and themed visuals. Manages user responses to show different celebratory layouts.
frontend/src/pages/WhyILoveYou.tsx: Page displaying interactive heart flip cards, each revealing a reason for love when tapped. Includes animated backgrounds and a grid of cards with emoji fronts and text backs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending custom colors, fonts, animations, shadows, and layout utilities. Enables plugins and defines a romantic-themed design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the romantic proposal website, existing features, known issues, and versioning. Notes missing background music implementation and tracks feature requirements.
